summary: An Ordinance amending Section One (1) of Ordinance No. 38405, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to West Andover Street; West Andover Street, from Twenty-sixth Avenue Southwest to Twenty-eighth Avenue Southwest; Twenty-eighth Avenue Southwest, from West Andover Street to Yancy Street; all in the City of Seattle; all in accordance with Resolution No. 5797 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", approved May 1, 1918.
